segments.text: The world changes , the family changes too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: People now like a small family composed of two parents and one child .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is called a nuclear family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't like such a family .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of family are you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like a family composed of many people . It includes grandparents , parents , aunts and uncles , and children .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a traditional family . It may be too large to live well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can live well , I think .
segments.speaker: S1
